name: backbone-fc
heading: Backbone-FusionCharts
subHeading: Simple and Lightweight Backbone wrapper for FusionCharts JavaScript Charting Library
about: The Backbone-FusionCharts wrapper lets you easily include FusionCharts in your Backbone projects. It easily adds interactive chart to your Backbone applications.
features: Adds a chart using just a single controller.
Auto-updates the chart object when the data source is modified.
Adds a chart from a JSON URL, from a XML URL, or using just JS Objects.
Allows to include interactivity between Javascript charts.
Offers advanced control by giving you access to the complete FusionCharts object (that contains the chart configuration).
